group_1.textLeft: You want to quit lacrosse club?

group_1.textRight: Yes.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...Are you serious?

group_1.textRight: Serious!

group_1.textLeft: Is that so...
Think again.

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: You know it, right?
Even if you're in a slump, you're needed in our club.
You easily say that you want to quit, but it's not@that easy.

group_1.textRight: B-but...

group_1.textLeft: First of all, what's the reason you want to quit@the club?

group_1.textRight: That is...how to put it...
I just can't get into lacrosse I'd say...

group_1.textLeft: Then, what's a thing you can get into?

group_1.textRight: What thing, you ask me but...

group_1.textLeft: Listen Kirari, I too am a teacher.
I've seen many kinds of students for years until now.
I just know how serious or how eager they are if I@see them.
I also know you're not very enthusiastic about@lacrosse.
However, when I saw you play for the first time...
At least I felt like you were enjoying it.
How about you try going all out just once?
If you do so, I'll consider your resignment.

group_1.textRight: ...But, but what for?

group_1.textLeft: I don't want to say this but...
Anyone who can't get serious with one single thing...
...is only able to do a half-baked job.
So, if you experience seriousness just for once...

group_1.textRight: I can't...I can't...
Hikaru has, never got serious with anything.
It's no use no matter how hard I try!

group_1.textLeft: Kirari...
Quitting the club won't solve anything.
It'll only leave the shameful you who couldn't@continue lacrosse.

group_1.textRight: I know, such things!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, hey!@Kirari!!

group_1.textCenter: (I have no one I can lean on...)
(I don't want to see anyone now...)
(...Hikaru knows better that the advisor is right.)
(That Kyubey thing didn't grant me my wish@after all.)
Why does no one understand this...

group_1.textRight: It's sad that no one understands you.

group_1.textLeft: ...Huh?@Who...? How...?

group_1.textRight: I heard someone crying while walking down the@corridor.
That'd make anyone want to know the reason,@wouldn't it?
Let's not get hung up on whether the motive was@curiosity or anxiety...okay?

group_1.textLeft: Curiosity...?

group_1.textRight: Don't make such an angry face. Of course, I am@concerned, so I came to see what was wrong.
There, wipe your tears with this.

group_1.textLeft: ...Thank you.
Umm...

group_1.textRight: ...Yes?

group_1.textLeft: You're from the high school division...@I'm sorry you had to see something weird.

group_1.textRight: I don't mind. And more than that, are you feeling@better?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yes...@I feel okay now, so thank you...

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* No need to be grateful, but instead...
Yuna Kureha, please remember it.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?@What do you mean by that...

group_1.textRight: So long.

group_1.textLeft: W-wait, hold on!

group_1.textCenter: Not sure if she's being kind to me or if she's@making fun of me...[chara:102201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102201:cheek_0][chara:102201:motion_200][chara:102201:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:102201:lipSynch_1]Ah.
Hikaru was the type who gets easily bored.
